snippet.title: DEMO OUT NOW! | Tales From The Other Side | By Levc
snippet.description:
GET THE DEMO FOR TALES FROM THE OTHER SIDE HERE:

In the official webpage:
https://levcstudio.neocities.org/theotherside/demo

In Itch.io:
https://levc-egm.itch.io/theothersidedemo

In steam (Releases the next day, march 25):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894870/Tales_From_The_Other_Side/

(*The Tales From The Other Side DEMO includes the first chapter in the story.)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"TALES FROM THE OTHER SIDE" (or "THE OTHER SIDE" for short) is an upcoming indie JRPG by Levc EGM. 

With a gameplay inspired by games like "Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga" and "Undertale", awaits an adventure that will lead you to question who you are, who you were, and who you'll be.

With a peculiar cast of characters and with a full 32 packed OST, The demo awaits for you! 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow the OFFICIAL twitter page:
https://twitter.com/RPGTheOtherSide

Or visit the OFFICIAL webpage:
https://levcstudio.neocities.org/theotherside/

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#talesfromtheotherside #indiedev #indiegame #gamedev #gamemakerstudio2 #gamemaker 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

newgrounds: https://levc.newgrounds.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Levc_EGM​​
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/levc-egm 
Tumblr: https://levc-egm.tumblr.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/levc_egm/
Bandcamp: https://levcegm.bandcamp.com/​​

My Website: https://levcstudio.neocities.org
Email: contactolevc@gmail.com
